product_name: Haiku Blossom Vertical Tote - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Haiku Blossom Vertical Tote carries your 13 in. laptop in a padded sleeve and has pockets galore to keep your phone, wallet and keys where you can easily find them. Built-in padded sleeve holds a tablet or a laptop up to 13 in. Drop pockets on either side of the laptop sleeve are perfect for folders, files and papers. Dual 17 in. straps fit over your shoulder. Pockets include 1 external zip and 1 internal zip. Made from recycled PET plastic bottles, each Haiku Blossom Vertical Tote keeps 30.6 bottles out of a landfill. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Haiku Blossom Vertical Tote carries your 13 in. laptop in a padded sleeve and has pockets galore to keep your phone, wallet and keys where you can easily find them.
